metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: a bamboo sushi mat has a 1-inch border. roll the nori tightly using the bamboo mat. sliced into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce.
thread chicken, bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion onto skewers. serve cold or reheat before serving. reheat your oven to 350 degrees.
the tortilla is golden brown and has a golden brown color. cook in a skillet over medium heat until the cheese is melted.
add bell pepper, broccoli, and snap peas. stir-fry until tender. serve over rice. if you have any questions, please contact us.
tortillas are a perfect choice for extra crunch. croutons are a great option for extra crunch. croutons are a great option for extra crunch.
mashed potatoes and grated cheddar cheese are all covered. heat oven to 400°F (200°C). mashed potatoes are sprinkled with grated cheddar cheese.
fettuccine is cooked according to package instructions. add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. pour heavy cream into the skillet and bring to a simmer.
sauté shrimp or chicken in vegetable oil until cooked. sauté eggs in same pan. add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp or chicken, and chopped green onions.
in a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. cook diced onion until translucent. add diced tomatoes and simmer for an additional 10 minutes.
sauté beef broth until tender. add mushrooms and cook until tender. add sour cream and paprika, season with salt and pepper.
in a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. cook bacon until crispy, then set aside. add diced onion, minced garlic, sliced mushrooms, and carrots.
in a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. cook diced onion and minced garlic until softened. add cubed chicken and cook until browned.
enchiladas are shredded cheese and sprinkle with shredded cheese. enchiladas are a popular dish for enchiladas.
sliced onion, minced garlic, sliced ginger, star anise, and cinnamon stick. pour hot broth over top.
sauté chicken and cook until browned. add green curry paste, coconut milk, chicken broth, fish sauce. serve over cooked rice.
in a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and cumin. in a skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
